name: Mentoring Minds
overview:
Mentoring Minds is an educational publisher focused on creating a successful learning environment for children.

Our philosophy: We consider ourselves partners with educators in the continuous pursuit of providing a quality education for all students. As educators dedicated to excellence, it is our privilege to provide valuable teaching tools that are needed to empower teachers and to positively impact the lives of children.

We take great pride in being a service-oriented company with the thousands of educators who invest in our products daily. Our staff is committed to serving your needs promptly and politely. Should you find any of our products less than outstanding, please return them to us for a full refund. We consider ourselves â€œpartnersâ€ in your continuous pursuit of providing children the best education possible and are ready and willing to provide you with the quality tools you need to be successful.

Please contact me personally if you have any questions about the â€œlatestâ€ happenings in the educational world, or if you have feedback that would help us to better serve your needs. My phone number is 800-585-5258 or e-mail me at michael@mentoringminds.com.

Your partner in success,

Michael L. Lujan, M.Ed. Founder, Mentoring Minds, L.P.
